title: Exploring Dinosaurs Before Dark
description: In this lesson, students will dive into the story 'Dinosaurs Before Dark' by analyzing character motivations, important events, and themes while making predictions and inferences.

prompts.input: Why do you think the characters were excited to go to the treehouse? What feelings do you think they had?
hints: Think about what they might have hoped to find.
Consider how adventure makes people feel.

prompts.input: How do you think the characters' actions changed the story? Can you think of an event that made a big difference?
hints: Remember a moment when they made a choice and what happened after.
What do you think could have happened if they chose differently?

prompts.input: What do you think is the main lesson or theme of the story? How did you figure that out?
hints: Look at what the characters learned by the end.
Think about how their experiences might relate to real life.
